PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-08762021-08-11FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActAuditor General Act
Income Tax Act
SubjectAgreements entered into by the Government of Canada
PrecisOrder requesting that the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA (a) annually conduct the external and independent review of the cost reconciliation process referred to in any agreement between the Government of Canada and the government of a province or territory on the reconfiguration of the Canada Workers Benefit; and (b) provide a report on the results of those reviews.
AttachmentsAttachment
